name: WildStar
description:
WildStar is a fantasy and science fiction themed massively multiplayer online role-playing game. It was initially released as with paid subscription but in 2015 became free-to-play.

Setting

The game takes place on a planet Nexus. It used to be a home planet for powerful and technologically advanced ancient race Eldan. After an unsuccessful experiment to create an ultimate being, the whole race vanished. Centuries later, the planet became a point of interest for two rival fractions – huge space empire known as The Dominion and rebels Exiles. As a player, you have to join one of the factions and explore the planet of Nexus.

Gameplay

In WildStar you can choose between eight races, four for each faction, six classes and four paths. None of the races has any bonuses; however, some races cannot choose certain classes. Your playstyle depends on your class and path combination. The classes affect character’s stats and abilities; however, each class has its set of offensive abilities and can serve the role of a damage dealer. The paths effect on types of quests you can accept, give you special rewards and several unique abilities.
The combat system in WildStar is more action-based than in classic MMORPGs. Most of the attacks in the game have a certain range and can be evaded. Some of the game’s quests incorporate puzzles and platforming sequences.
